column5: Access to our private community pool during the summer and just steps from the park and jogging trail. Enjoy the Cowboys' training camp, Rough Riders ball park, FC Dallas soccer complex and all the shopping amenities Frisco has to offer. All within 10 mins from the house. Our place is great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families, and small groups.
column8: Cozy family home away from home
